Subinterfaces of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.osm.data.searching
 interface IPlaceFinder
          A place-finder is capable of finding a $Place} in a $MemoryDataSet by name.

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gps
 

Subinterfaces of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gps
 interface IGPSProvider
          This interface is implemented by plugins that can provide the current position of the user('s vehicle).
 

Classes in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gps that implement IPlugin

          Dummy-GPS-provider that never has a fix.
 class GpsDProvider
          IGPSProvider that connects to a GPSD.
 class GPXFileProvider
          IGPSProvider that reads a local file.
 

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.gui.widgets

          A PaintVisitor is capable of drawing the map.

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing
 

Subinterfaces of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing
 interface IRouter
          This interface is implemented by routing-algorithms.
 

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.describers
 

Classes in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.describers that implement IPlugin
 class SimpleRouteDescriber
          This is a tivial route-describer that does no combining of segments ("follow this street for 2Km") nor directions ("turn right") but simple names the segments as best as it can.
 

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.metrics
 

Subinterfaces of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.metrics
 interface IRoutingMetric
          A routing-metric is a function that can provide the "cost" of using a given way or crossing a given node.
 

Classes in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.metrics that implement IPlugin
 class ShortestRouteMetric
          This metric simply calculated the length of a way- segment.
 class StaticFastestRouteMetric
          This metric simply calculated the travel-time of a way- segment using known averages.
 

Uses of IPlugin in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.routers
 

Classes in org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.routing.routers that implement IPlugin
 class DepthFirstRouter
          This is a simple recursive demo-router that does a depth-first-search in the graph of Segments and aborts at a given maximum depth or the first route found.
 class DijkstraRouter
          A simple Dijkstra.
 class DirectedDepthFirstRouter
          This is a special DepthFirstRouter that tries the segment that leads near the target first and goes on in that order.
